Name: source
Description: Data source

Name: date
Description: Day of the statistics

Name: gid
Description: Unique geographical ID, for more details see https://gadm.org/

Name: country
Description: English name for the country

Name: countrycode
Description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country codes

Name: adm_area_1
Description: First-level administrative country subdivision

Name: adm_area_2
Description: Second-level administrative country subdivision

Name: adm_area_3
Description: Third-level administrative country subdivision

Name: c1_school_closing
Description: Record closings of schools and universities

Name: c1_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c2_workplace_closing
Description: Record closings of workplaces

Name: c2_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c3_cancel_public_events
Description: Record cancelling public events

Name: c3_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c4_restrictions_on_gatherings
Description: Record limits on private gatherings

Name: c4_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c5_close_public_transport
Description: Record closing of public transport

Name: c5_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c6_stay_at_home_requirements
Description: Record orders to "shelter-in-place" and otherwise confine to the home

Name: c6_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c7_restrictions_on_internal_movement
Description: Record restrictions on internal movement between cities/regions

Name: c7_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: c8_international_travel_controls
Description: Record restrictions on international travel. Note: this records policy for foreign travellers, not citizens

Name: e1_income_support
Description: Record if the government is providing direct cash payments to people who lose their jobs or cannot work. Note: only includes payments to firms if explicitly linked to payroll/salaries

Name: e1_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: e2_debtcontract_relief
Description: Record if the government is freezing financial obligations for households (eg stopping loan repayments, preventing services like water from stopping, or banning evictions)

Name: e3_fiscal_measures
Description: Announced economic stimulus spending. Note: only record amount additional to previously announced spendings

Name: e4_international_support
Description: Announced offers of Covid-19 related aid spending to other countries. Note: only record amount additional to previously announced spending

Name: h1_public_information_campaigns
Description: Record presence of public info campaigns

Name: h1_flag
Description: Binary flag for geographic scope

Name: h2_testing_policy
Description: Record government policy on who has access to testing. Note: this records policies about testing for current infection (PCR tests) not testing for immunity (antibody test)

Name: h3_contact_tracing
Description: Record government policy on contact tracing after a positive diagnosis

Name: h4_emergency_investment_in_healthcare
Description: Announced short term spending on healthcare system, e.g. hospitals, masks, etc. Note: only record amount additional to previously announced spending

Name: h5_investment_in_vaccines
Description: Announced public spending on Covid-19 vaccine development. Note: only record amount additional to previously announced spending

Name: m1_wildcard
Description: Record policy announcements that do not fit anywhere else

Name: stringency_index
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: stringency_indexfordisplay
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: stringency_legacy_index
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: stringency_legacy_indexfordisplay
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: government_response_index
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: government_response_index_for_display
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: containment_health_index
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: containment_health_index_for_display
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: economic_support_index
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: economic_support_index_for_display
Description: Calculated as a function of the individual indicators, see https://github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker/blob/master/documentation/index_methodology.md#dealing-with-gaps-in-the-data-for-display-purposes

Name: actions
Description: Raw response from Covid Tracker API Covid Tracker API containing all above indicators with full description stored in JSON format
